1748: Occurrence means any one loss or series of losses consequent upon or attributable to one source or original cause. Page | 10 Offshore means from the time of embarkation onto a conveyance at the point of final departure to any Offshore installation, including but not limited to any Offshore rig or platform, whilst on any Offshore installation or support or accommodation vessel for an Offshore installation, until disembarkation onto land upon return from such installation.
